H0.text: In what year did Torville and Dean (Jane and Christopher) win their first Olympic gold, scoring 12 perfect sixes in their free-dance routine. 1976

H1.text: In what year did Torville and Dean (Jane and Christopher) win their first Olympic gold, scoring 12 perfect sixes in their free-dance routine. 1980

H2.text: In what year did Torville and Dean (Jane and Christopher) win their first Olympic gold, scoring 12 perfect sixes in their free-dance routine. 1988

H3.text: In what year did Torville and Dean (Jane and Christopher) win their first Olympic gold, scoring 12 perfect sixes in their free-dance routine. 1984

A4.text: At the Sarajevo 1984 Winter Olympics the pair won gold and received twelve perfect 6.0s in their free-dance routine.

A5.text: They finished fifth at the 1980 Winter Olympics in Lake Placid.
